projects.title: They Keep The Lights On At Night
projects.description: Explore an empty office building at night. Watch out for jumpscares. My final project from Fundamentals of Game Engines at Raritan Valley Community College, and my first major Unity project. The purpose was to learn Unity's various subsystems, so it's not fully implemented, but the level can be played all the way through.
